title: Bronze ADC looking for support main
body:
Hey im a {{champion:429}}  main with 180k mastery points. Really im just looking for a serious duo queue who wants to climb. 

I Prefer a tank support or high cc support such as 
{{champion:412}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:223}} or{{champion:117}} 


Thanks!

replies.body: yea sent you a friend request looking to duo with you I am b3 95lp
